医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示脂肪肝如何导致肝癌加州大学圣地亚哥分校医学院的科学家们对肝癌的发展有了新的认识，肝癌是全球第六大最常诊断的癌症，也是全球癌症死亡的第四大原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Study-reveals-how-fatty-liver-disease-leads-to-liver-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Study-reveals-how-fatty-liver-disease-leads-to-liver-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cfe48db-8c6e-4c58-a836-de3c6d922951 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 11:12:12 -0500 Study reveals how fatty liver disease leads to liver cancer
新研究证实氯氮平安全且血癌风险最小香港大学李嘉诚医学院（港大医学院）的跨系研究团队进行了全球首个分析性真实世界队列研究，研究高效抗精神病药物氯氮平与血癌发病率的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/New-research-affirms-clozapine-safety-with-minimal-blood-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/New-research-affirms-clozapine-safety-with-minimal-blood-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74b5629c-0124-4afb-8763-f1e176bfd2a3 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 11:06:05 -0500 New research affirms clozapine safety with minimal blood cancer risk
公共卫生专家概述了处理 HPAI H5N1 传播的关键步骤高致病性 H5N1 禽流感病毒（HPAI H5N1）对公众的风险仍然较低，美国公共卫生专家认为，现有的以及正在开发的治疗方法和疫苗足以预防严重疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Public-health-experts-outline-ritic-steps-in-handling-HPAI-H5N1-spread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Public-health-experts-outline-ritic-steps-in-handling-HPAI-H5N1-spread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e71652e-1a5c-476d-b978-6dfeb9be8d27 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 11:00:48 -0500 Public health experts outline critical steps in handling HPAI H5N1 spread
体力活动可降低患慢性病的风险爱荷华大学的研究人员建议对所有患者进行身体活动水平调查，此前一项新研究强调了身体活动与慢性疾病之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Physical-activity-linked-to-lower-risk-of-having-chronic-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Physical-activity-linked-to-lower-risk-of-having-chronic-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7eac73f-5dca-4f3d-b807-fd018837d868 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 10:50:51 -0500 Physical activity linked to lower risk of having chronic conditions
三四脯氨酸对嗜碱性粒细胞介导的过敏性炎症影响的新见解炎症是人体防御机制的重要组成部分，在抵抗感染和修复组织损伤方面发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/New-insights-into-tristetraprolins-impact-on-basophil-mediated-allergic-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/New-insights-into-tristetraprolins-impact-on-basophil-Medical-allergic-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8af2dcd7-e1ad-4313-9b0c-ebd41d99b6e5 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 10:29:27 -0500 New insights into tristetraprolin's impact on basophil-mediated allergic inflammation
Bedfont® Scientific Limited 向成功的参与者展示了 CELLER8® 设备，为 Shaun 在肯特郡中心地带的小道活动画上了圆满的句号由 Bedfont® 赞助的 Shaun in the Heart of Kent 艺术小径团结了社区，同时支持肯特之心临终关怀中心并通过 CELLER8® 促进健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Conclusions-the-Shaun-in-the-Heart-of-Kent-Trail-by-P​​resenting-a-CELLER8c2ae-Device-致成功参与者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Conclusions-the-Shaun-in-the-Heart-of-Kent-Trail-by-P​​resenting-a-CELLER8c2ae-Device-致成功参与者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=000223a0-7eb8-452c-9d38-edffeb7a6fd9 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 10:16:00 -0500 Bedfont® Scientific Limited Concludes the Shaun in the Heart of Kent Trail by Presenting a CELLER8® Device to a Successful Participant
新研究揭示烟草 21 世纪政策的更大影响2020年，随着全国越来越多的州和地方寻求提高购买烟草的年龄以保护年轻人的健康，联邦购买烟草产品的最低年龄正式从18岁提高到21岁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/New-research-reveals-greater-impact-of-Tobacco-21-policies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/New-research-reveals-greater-impact-of-Tobacco-21-policies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93832e72-0a98-4c82-b7f1-db52ed24b884 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 09:11:00 -0500 New research reveals greater impact of Tobacco 21 policies
耶鲁大学的研究确定了一些无脑畸形疾病背后的分子机制无脑畸形是一系列罕见的遗传性疾病，其中大脑无法发育出其标志性的褶皱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Yale-study-identizes-molecular-mechanism-behind-some-lissencephaly-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Yale-study-identizes-molecular-mechanism-behind-some-lissencephaly-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3cff771-22db-4743-bba7-080a19ac895e Thu, 02 Jan 2025 08:42:00 -0500 Yale study identifies molecular mechanism behind some lissencephaly disorders
新的人工智能技术改善了 PET 和 CT 扫描中的肿瘤检测人工智能有潜力改善医学图像数据的分析。例如，基于深度学习的算法可以确定肿瘤的位置和大小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/New-AI-techniques-improve-tumor-detection-in-PET-and-CT-scans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/New-AI-techniques-improve-tumor-detection-in-PET-and-CT-scans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00b3e0d6-6573-4ca8-a4e8-442493c6809a Thu, 02 Jan 2025 07:50:40 -0500 New AI techniques improve tumor detection in PET and CT scans
研究探索碳纳米管如何帮助去除水中的类固醇激素类固醇激素是最广泛的水生微污染物之一。它们对人类健康有害，并导致水生环境的生态失衡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Research-explores-how-carbon-nanotubes-help-remove-steroid-hormones-from-water.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Research-explores-how-carbon-nanotubes-help-remove-steroid-hormones-from-water.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7242f2ca-4f1a-4c2d-84b2-caaf4b8f7443 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 07:40:00 -0500 Research explores how carbon nanotubes help remove steroid hormones from water
